amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $30 million to the International Narcotics Control and Law Enforcement account from the Fulbright Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 91 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to transfer $30 million to the International Narcotics Control and Law Enforcement account from the Fulbright Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 248 (Roll no. 467).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 248 (Roll no. 467).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Rothfus.
